kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

Template keyword for email validation Accepts email and expected result: - email: Email address - expected_result: either 'valid' or 'invalid' Tests whether the emails are in correct form, and the app handles them correctly.

kw.doc: Closes the current application and the webdriver session.

Verify that React Native Alert with 'Please enter a valid email address' appears

kw.name: Dismiss Alert Dialog
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Clicks the element identified by ``locator``.
Dismiss the React Native Alert by tapping OK
Try to login with invalid email and verify error appears
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

Template keyword for email validation Accepts email and expected result: - email: Email address - expected_result: either 'valid' or 'invalid' Tests whether the emails are in correct form, and the app handles them correctly.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and the webdriver session.

suite.doc: Data driven login test using DataDriver driver and csv

suite.name: Open Application

test.name: Should open application and verify input field is displayed

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to the given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.19/guides/caps/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | No | alias |

kw.name: Verify Email Input Filed Is Displayed
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` is visible.

suite.doc: Test suite for application openning. Tested by verifying that the email input field is displayed.
